verses.verse: The wicked<WH7563> flee<WH5127> when no man pursueth<WH7291>; But the righteous<WH6662> are bold<WH982> as a lion<WH3715>.

For the transgression<WH6588> of a land<WH776> many<WH7227> are the princes<WH8269> thereof<WH120>; But by men of understanding<WH995> and knowledge<WH3045> the state<WH3651> thereof shall be prolonged<WH748>.
A needy<WH7326> man<WH1397> that oppresseth<WH6231> the poor<WH1800> Is like a sweeping<WH5502> rain<WH4306> which leaveth no food<WH3899>.
They that forsake<WH5800> the law<WH8451> praise<WH1984> the wicked<WH7563>; But such as keep<WH8104> the law<WH8451> contend with them<WH1624>.
Evil <WH7451> men<WH582> understand<WH995> not justice<WH4941>; But they that seek<WH1245> Jehovah<WH3068> understand all things<WH995>.
Better <WH2896> is the poor<WH7326> that walketh<WH1980> in his integrity<WH8537>, Than he that is perverse<WH6141> in his ways<WH1870>, though he be rich<WH6223>.
Whoso keepeth<WH5341> the law<WH8451> is a wise<WH995> son<WH1121>; But he that is a companion<WH7462> of gluttons<WH2151> shameth<WH3637> his father<WH1>.
He that augmenteth<WH7235> his substance<WH1952> by interest<WH5392> and increase<WH8636>, Gathereth<WH6908> it for him that hath pity<WH2603> on the poor<WH1800>.
He that turneth away<WH5493> his ear<WH241> from hearing<WH8085> the law<WH8451>, Even his prayer<WH8605> is an abomination<WH8441>.

Whoso causeth the upright<WH3477> to go astray<WH7686> in an evil<WH7451> way<WH1870>, He shall fall<WH5307> himself into his own pit<WH7816>; But the perfect<WH8549> shall inherit<WH5157> good<WH2896>.
The rich<WH6223> man<WH376> is wise<WH2450> in his own conceit<WH5869>; But the poor<WH1800> that hath understanding<WH995> searcheth him out<WH2713>.
When the righteous<WH6662> triumph<WH5970>, there is great<WH7227> glory<WH8597>; But when the wicked<WH7563> rise<WH6965>, men<WH120> hide themselves<WH2664>.
He that covereth<WH3680> his transgressions<WH6588> shall not prosper<WH6743>: But whoso confesseth<WH3034> and forsaketh<WH5800> them shall obtain mercy<WH7355>.
Happy <WH835> is the man<WH120> that feareth<WH6342> alway<WH8548>; But he that hardeneth<WH7185> his heart<WH3820> shall fall<WH5307> into mischief<WH7451>.
As a roaring<WH5098> lion<WH738>, and a ranging<WH8264> bear<WH1677>, So is a wicked<WH7563> ruler<WH4910> over a poor<WH1800> people<WH5971>.
The prince<WH5057> that lacketh<WH2638> understanding<WH8394> is also a great<WH7227> oppressor<WH4642>; But he that hateth<WH8130> covetousness<WH1215> shall prolong<WH748> his days<WH3117>.
A man<WH120> that is laden<WH6231> with the blood<WH1818> of any person<WH5315> Shall flee<WH5127> unto the pit<WH953>; Let no man stay him<WH8551>.
Whoso walketh<WH1980> uprightly<WH8549> shall be delivered<WH3467>; But he that is perverse<WH6140> in his ways<WH1870> shall fall<WH5307> at once<WH259>.
He that tilleth<WH5647> his land<WH127> shall have plenty<WH7646> of bread<WH3899>; But he that followeth<WH7291> after vain<WH7386> persons shall have poverty enough<WH7389>.
A faithful<WH530> man<WH376> shall abound<WH7227> with blessings<WH1293>; But he that maketh haste<WH213> to be rich<WH6238> shall not be unpunished<WH5352>.
To have respect<WH5234> of persons<WH6440> is not good<WH2896>; Neither that a man<WH1397> should transgress<WH6586> for a piece<WH6595> of bread<WH3899>.
he <WH376> that hath an evil<WH7451> eye<WH5869> hasteth<WH926> after riches<WH1952>, And knoweth<WH3045> not that want<WH2639> shall come upon him<WH935>.
He that rebuketh<WH3198> a man<WH120> shall afterward<WH310> find<WH4672> more favor<WH2580> Than he that flattereth<WH2505> with the tongue<WH3956>.
Whoso robbeth<WH1497> his father<WH1> or his mother<WH517>, and saith<WH559>, It is no transgression<WH6588>, The same is the companion<WH2270> of a destroyer<WH376>.
He that is of a greedy<WH7342> spirit<WH5315> stirreth up<WH1624> strife<WH4066>; But he that putteth his trust<WH982> in Jehovah<WH3068> shall be made fat<WH1878>.
He that trusteth<WH982> in his own heart<WH3820> is a fool<WH3684>; But whoso walketh<WH1980> wisely<WH2451>, he shall be delivered<WH4422>.
He that giveth<WH5414> unto the poor<WH7326> shall not lack<WH4270>; But he that hideth<WH5956> his eyes<WH5869> shall have many<WH7227> a curse<WH3994>.
When the wicked<WH7563> rise<WH6965>, men<WH120> hide<WH5641> themselves<WH6>; But when they perish, the righteous<WH6662> increase<WH7235>.
